timeline.message: update template to use non-deprecated method
deprecate error in favor of reject

timeline.bodyText:
on Xcode the message appears as


'success' is deprecated: Use `resolve()`

So I think it would be better to use it like this

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                @available(*, deprecated, message: "Use `resolve()`")
          
          
            
                @available(*, deprecated, message: "Use 'resolve'")
          
      
    
    
  

so it appears as 'success' is deprecated: Use 'resolve'
timeline.author: jcesarmobile
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -62,10 +62,12 @@ public typealias PluginEventListener = CAPPluginCall
         return self.options.index(forKey: key) != nil
     }
 
+    @available(*, deprecated, message: "Use `resolve()`")

replies.bodyText: If I use renamed: "resolve" then this is the message that appears and there's an option to fix automatically:
replies.author: imhoffd

timeline.author: jcesarmobile
jcesarmobile
